message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. $180 is a bit steep for me. How about $140? I'm really interested in the product and I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I understand that $140 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $155?
Alice, $155 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $150. This is my final offer, as I can get the product for that price elsewhere.

I understand that you're looking to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $157.50. I'm willing to meet you at this price, but I'm not sure how much longer I'll be able to hold out.
